TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit AppDomainUnloadedException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 嘗試存取已卸載應用程式定義域時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to access an unloaded application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，也就是在未處理的使用者程式碼具有下列結果：In the .NET Framework version 2.0, an that is not handled in user code has the following effect: - 如果執行緒已開始在 managed 程式碼，它會終止。If a thread was started in managed code, it is terminated. 不允許未處理的例外狀況是終止該應用程式。The unhandled exception is not allowed to terminate the application. - 如果正在執行中工作執行緒，它就會終止和執行緒返回執行緒集區。If a task is executing on a thread, it is terminated and the thread is returned to the thread pool. 不允許未處理的例外狀況是終止該應用程式。The unhandled exception is not allowed to terminate the application. - 如果在 unmanaged 程式碼，例如，在主應用程式執行緒的執行緒啟動它就會終止。If a thread started in unmanaged code, such as the main application thread, it is terminated. 若要繼續，允許處理的例外狀況，且作業系統會結束應用程式。The unhandled exception is allowed to proceed, and the operating system terminates the application. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_APPDOMAINUNLOADED，0x80131014 的值。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_APPDOMAINUNLOADED, which has the value 0x80131014. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範的效果上不同的執行緒，與第二個顯示基本的應用程式網域卸載。The first example demonstrates the effects of an on various threads, and the second shows elementary application domain unloading. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例會定義`TestClass`可以跨應用程式定義域界限封送處理的類別和`Example`類別包含`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`ThreadProc`方法。The following code example defines a `TestClass` class that can be marshaled across application domain boundaries and an `Example` class containing a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `ThreadProc` method. `ThreadProc`方法產生應用程式定義域時，建立`TestClass`物件在網域中，呼叫的方法和`TestClass`的卸載執行的網域，導致。The `ThreadProc` method creates an application domain, creates a `TestClass` object in the domain, and calls a method of `TestClass` that unloads the executing domain, causing an . `TestClass`方法例外狀況處理而執行執行緒和一般的執行緒，示範未處理的例外狀況終止工作或執行緒，但不是應用程式。The `TestClass` method is executed without exception handling from a thread and from an ordinary thread, demonstrating that the unhandled exception terminates the task or thread but not the application. 然後，執行時與不處理從主應用程式的執行緒，示範它終止應用程式時，如果未處理的例外狀況。It is then executed with and without exception handling from the main application thread, demonstrating that it terminates the application if not handled. [!code-csharp[AppDomainUnloadedException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainUnloadedException/cs/Sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainUnloadedException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainUnloadedException/vb/Sample.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例會建立和卸載應用程式定義域，並示範後續嘗試存取已卸載的網域擲回。The following code example creates and unloads an application domain, and demonstrates that an is thrown on a subsequent attempt to access the unloaded domain. [!code-cpp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CPP/adunload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CS/adunload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/VB/adunload.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 目標應用程式定義域已經卸載。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The target application domain has been unloaded." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

span.span: The message that describes the error.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 Null 參考，目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值如果傳遞到建構函式，則為 null 參考屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|
